item.title: The more the merrier: ICXCAC fields another huge turnout at Mitcham Common race
item.author: Aymeric Regnier,
item.description: As the sun rose on the first morning of November, the Cross-Country runners woke up and – looking at their alarm – saw it was already time to grab their kit for the second London Universities and Colleges (LUCA) race of the season. The race would take place at Mitcham Common in South London, just …
